alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Gila Bend; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Tonopah Desert; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 445 PM MST... At 359 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms extending from Casa Grande to near Estrella Sailport to near Palo Verde. Movement was northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs, blow around unsecured objects, and generate blowing dust. Locations impacted include... Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, Casa Grande, Gila Bend, Tonopah, Maricopa, Estrella, Arizona City, Palo Verde, Big Horn, Cotton Center, Liberty, Bapchule, Estrella Sailport, Olberg, Arizola, Estrella Mountain Park, Palo Verde Nuclear Generation Station and Wintersburg. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 79 and 118, and between mile markers 168 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 111 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 152 and 157. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Gila Bend; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Tonopah Desert; West Pinal County
